personal_info.summary: I am a proactive software developer with hands-on experience in backend development and master data management, particularly in SAP environments.

responsibilities: Developed a microservices application using Java, Spring Boot, and Spring Security with JWT.
Implemented management systems for employees, clients, and package shipments.
Created unit tests to validate system functionality.
achievements: Reduced deployment time by implementing microservices, optimizing system scalability and performance.
Improved operational efficiency by implementing a comprehensive management system for employees, clients, and shipments, resulting in increased customer satisfaction.
Increased test coverage, ensuring system reliability and stability, and reducing production errors.

responsibilities: Specialize in master data management and SAP.
Generate reports with TOAD and SQL while managing data and ensuring its quality.
Use advanced HTML and CSS and program macros in Excel with Visual Basic.
Collaborate efficiently in a team setting.
achievements: Developed a macro in Excel with Visual Basic that automated a process, reducing the total manual work time by 75%.
Created detailed and clear reports using TOAD and SQL, facilitating informed decision-making by management.

responsibilities: Achieved significant growth in customer service and English proficiency.
Improved fluency in English, both spoken and written, for effective communication with clients.
Drafted professional documents in English within a customer service environment.
Developed effective communication skills in English.
achievements: Achieved fluency in English, allowing for effective interaction with international clients.
Fostered empathy and understanding in interactions with English-speaking clients, resulting in higher client retention and positive feedback.

work_experience.job_title: Bilingual Advisor for Disney+ and Hulu
responsibilities: Provided high-quality customer support for Disney+ and Hulu users, handling inquiries and troubleshooting issues efficiently.
Delivered excellent service while working remotely, maintaining productivity and self-discipline in a home-based environment.
Communicated effectively in English with international clients through multiple channels (phone, chat, and email).
Drafted clear and professional responses in English, ensuring customer satisfaction and resolution of concerns.
Developed effective communication skills in English.
achievements: Consistently exceeded performance metrics, achieving top-tier customer satisfaction scores.
Maintained high efficiency and resolution rates while adapting to remote work dynamics.
Enhanced problem-solving and conflict resolution skills, leading to improved customer retention.
Recognized for outstanding performance and dedication to delivering exceptional customer service.
